#summary &leftarrow; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesL

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesL L] > &leftarrow;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&LeftArrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2190/index.htm U+02190].
  * `&Leftarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d0/index.htm U+021D0].
  * `&leftarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2190/index.htm U+02190].
